CustomField.description: When Number of Questions to Present is configured, then the system will display random sets of questions to a quiz taker on retake.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: When enabled, this option will generate a fresh set of randomly selected questions for participants with each quiz retake, ensuring a diverse experience with every attempt. Disabling this setting maintains consistency by presenting the same set of questions on quiz retakes. Note: If the "Randomized Question Limit" is not configured, all available questions will be presented regardless of this setting.
CustomField.label: Re-Randomize Questions for Retakes
